T02D3508:156b-1: a'arya dz'am gu l'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3508:156b-3: 'phags ma dug sel ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3508:156b-4: 'phags ma dz'am gu l'i la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3508:156b-5: sngon gsungs cho gas rang nyid kyi //
T02D3508:156b-6: snying gar dkyil 'khor dmar po la //
T02D3508:156b-7: dz'am yig las ni ye shes rdzogs //
T02D3508:156b-8: rig ma dug sel ma zhes bya //
T02D3508:156b-9: ser mo sprul gyi gdengs ka bdun //
T02D3508:156b-10: 'bar zhing g-yo ba'i nor bus brgyan //
T02D3508:156b-11: zhal gsum dang ni spyan gsum ma //
T02D3508:156b-12: gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar //
T02D3508:156b-13: khro bo dang bcas de bzhin du //
T02D3508:156b-14: sbrul gyi ske rags kyis brgyan ma //
T02D3508:156b-15: phyag drug rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs //
T02D3508:156b-16: mi bskyod pa ni dbu la bzhugs //
T02D3508:156b-17: phyag g-yas na ni rdo rje ste //
T02D3508:156b-18: gnyis pa dag na ral gri 'phyar //
T02D3508:156b-19: gsum pa gar gyi tshul dang ni //
T02D3508:156b-20: bdud rnams skrag mdzad mda' bsnams so //
T02D3508:156b-21: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02D3508:156b-22: gnyis pa dug gi me tog bsnams //
T02D3508:157a-2: me tog gis brgyan ske rags te //
T02D3508:157a-3: padma'i gdan gnas gser gyi mdog //
T02D3508:157a-5: dbang po'i mtshon cha spro zhing sprul //
T02D3508:157a-7: sangs rgyas sku tshogs 'phro ba yi //
T02D3508:157a-8: zla bum nyid kyi phyag rgya bsnams //
T02D3508:157a-9: dug gi rgyal la dbang bskur zhing //
T02D3508:157a-10: dz'am yig gis ni kha brgyan pa //
T02D3508:157a-11: dug gis 'gyel la sku gsum gyi //
T02D3508:157a-12: dug sel ma ni rtag tu bsgom //
T02D3508:157a-13: de bzhin 'di ni sgom byed na //
T02D3508:157a-14: ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob //
T02D3508:157a-15: lag pa gnyis sprul gyi gdengs ka'i rnam pa ltar byas nas ;
T02D3508:157a-16: spyi bor gdengs ka gdugs lta bu rab tu sbyin pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3508:157a-18: aom na ma:sha ba ra ka m'a ri ye tsutstsha'am
T02D3508:157a-19: tso da ts'i la tsutstsha la ya sam gha dha
T02D3508:157a-20: ni mitta m'a t'am gi aa da bid dhe aa
